m_szDocSumamry: News:2012:Rossi Cold Fusion Featured / Best Exotic FE : Nuclear > Cold Fusion > LENR-to-Market Weekly -- December 27, 2012 - Highlights this week include: Rossi and LENR featured on Swedish TV; recap of E-Cat history by Dr. Christian Schumacher; Pirelli High School LENR conference reports; ICCF-17 conference videos; Renzo Mondaini's "cold fusion". (PESN; December 20, 2012) Featured : News > SmartScarecrow > This Week in Free Energy™ > Sterling's Weekly Free Energy Review on SmartScarecrow Show: December 20, 2012 - MSV Explorer amphibious vehicle powered by free energy technology • Elecotric cl
